section.heading: Prohibition on sexual orientation change efforts for minors.

para.text: A provider shall not engage in sexual orientation change efforts with a consumer who is a minor.

A violation of subsection (a) of this section shall be considered a failure to conform to acceptable conduct within the mental health profession under § 3-1205.14(a)(26) and shall subject a provider to discipline and penalties under § 3-1205.14(c).

annotations.annotation: as added Mar. 11, 2015, D.C. Law 20-218, § 2(b), 62 DCR 7
